result.execSummary:
All charges against Lawrence C. Ratliff IV in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Lawrence C. Ratliff IV is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lawrence C. Ratliff IV

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  11:02am.  22CF662/22CM792.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Daniel Tombasco appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody along w/Atty Donald Bielski.  VRC.  Cases are resolved.

22CF662 - deft pleads guilty to counts 2 &3; found guilty by the Court.  Admits to repeater.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 10/11/22 @ 2:30pm.  Count 1 is dismissed on State's motion.  NOTE - defense counsel may request an adjournment of the sentencing hrg in the event the deft has not been sentenced on his SAR in Br 4.   NOTE - State to file an amended information.

22CM792 - dismissed on State's motion.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.    Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Bielski. Attorney Bielski states he needs to go over the offer with the DE. PLEAH set to 08/10/22 at 10:30.

Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared by court w/ Attorney Bielski.  Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Bielski states that he needs to get the discovery and needs to talk with the state about an offer. STC set to 07/20/22 at 9:30.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with:  Cody T except for incidental.

225 PM    Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered. Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 01:00 pm.. $400  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). rb
